title: 68th UN General Assembly: President Rajapaksa arrives in New York
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix By: Sudath Silva – President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived in New York on 22 September (yesterday) to participate in the 68th United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) Session. He was warmly welcomed by UN Sri Lankan representative Dr. Palitha Kohona, his Deputy Major General Shavendra Silva, Ambassador of Sri Lanka to…
